description:
Life is better with more stripes. Fine-gauge knitting keeps these socks itch-free and lets your feet breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.

  • Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter
  • Performance fit hugs your foot to ensure no slipping, bunching or blisters
  • True Seamless™ construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Whetstone Lightweight Crew  Socks - Unisex
